DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Receptor Occupancy SK-1405 Healthy , Caucasian , Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Able willing provide write informed consent participate study , confirm signing inform consent document ( ) . Adult Caucasian male age ≥20 ≤50 year . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≥ 20 ≤ 30 kg/m2 . Height ≤ 190 cm . Subject nonsmoker smoke past 6 month . Subject consider good health opinion investigator . Subject 's prestudy clinical laboratory finding within normal range . Subject must willing able comply protocol requirement . Use prohibit medication describe study protocol . Current known suspect history drug/solvent abuse . Current known suspect history alcohol abuse currently drink excess 21 unit per week . Subjects consume caffeine containing product within 24 hour prior baseline PETCT . Any concurrent medical , surgical , psychiatric condition may affect subject 's ability meet protocol requirement study duration and/or significant illness investigator 's opinion 4 week screen . Participation clinical study investigational drug/device within three month prior first day dose enrolment current study . Subject positive result HIV screen , hepatitis B screen hepatitis C screen . Subject serious adverse reaction significant hypersensitivity drug . Subject donate 500 mL blood within three month prior screen . History neurological condition . Participation research study radiation exposure conjunction study would result additional ionisation radiation exposure exceed 10 mSv within last year . A contraindication MRI , include limited , MRIincompatible pacemaker , recent metallic implant , foreign body eye , indication assess standard preMRI questionnaire , preclude subject undergoing MRI scan . Subject claustrophobia . Subjects consume Saint John 's wort , red wine , Seville oranges , grapefruit grapefruit juice within 7 day prior dose . Subject partner either pregnant breastfeeding duration study .
